publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-174# John Scott: Paediatric Services in Ayrshire-That the Parliament notes the considerable concern in Ayrshire regarding the current review of paediatric services in the area; hopes that this review will be brought to a speedy conclusion, and further notes that there is a clear wish on the part of local people for the retention of the two paediatric units at Ayr and Crosshouse hospitals.

S2M-174# John Scott: Paediatric Services in Ayrshireâ€”That the Parliament notes the considerable concern in Ayrshire regarding the current review of paediatric services in the area; hopes that this review will be brought to a speedy conclusion, and further notes that there is a clear wish on the part of local people for the retention of the two paediatric units at Ayr and Crosshouse hospitals. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-174# Paediatric Services in Ayrshire (lodged on 18 June 2003) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-174# Paediatric Services in Ayrshire (lodged on 18 June 2003) Mrs Nanette Milne*
